plugin.name: 🖥️ Window Sets
plugin.description: Allows you to easily save and restore particular sets of NotePlan windows on macOS.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark
plugin.lastUpdateInfo:
v0.2: Window Set definitions now in user-editable notes, allowing an arbitrary number of them.
v0.1: First version, with basic save and restore functions.

plugin.commands.name: open window set
plugin.commands.description: Open a saved set of windows/panes
arguments: Saved Window Set name to open

plugin.commands.name: save window set
plugin.commands.description: Save the current windows/panes as a named set

plugin.commands_unused.name: delete window set
plugin.commands_unused.description: Delete a saved set of windows/panes

plugin.settings.title: Folder where Window Set definitions are stored
Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Tidy commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
